message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more since I'm losing money to inflation.
I think a 55/45 split is fairer considering inflation. I'm willing to take a bit less to ensure we both get something good.
Bob, my offer is decreasing, but it's still the best deal you'll get. Inflation is eating away at my share!
Alice, we're both losing money. I'm willing to take a bigger share, but we need to compromise to get something out of this. Let's split it 60/40.
